target.name: patches
target.sipx-sql: select name || '=true' from patch; select 'version' || version || '=true' from version_history;

target.name: upgrade
target.description: applied all patches that need to be applied, and run initialization tasks

target.name: unmanaged-to-acme
target.sipx-sql: update phone set bean_id = 'acmePhone' where bean_id = 'unmanagedPhone';

target.name: device-version
target.sipx-sql: alter table phone add column device_version_id varchar(32); alter table gateway add column device_version_id varchar(32); update phone set device_version_id = 'polycom1.6' where bean_id = 'polycom';

target.name: gateway-prefix
target.sipx-sql: alter table gateway add column prefix varchar(255);

target.name: migrate-2.8
target.description: migrate existing 2.8 PDS database, note clears all existing 3.0 data

target.name: import-2.8
target.description: import 2.8 PDS database from backup file, note clears all existing 3.0 data

target.name: reset-superadmin
target.description: initialize superadmin user, administation group and resets password to blank

target.name: setup
target.description: Run setup which in turn may run cfengine work if there is work to do

target.name: first-run
target.description: Make sipXconfig behave as it was just installed or upgraded.

target.name: polycom-2.0
target.description: Migrate all polycom phones to generate 2.0 profiles

target.name: migrate-polycom
target.sipx-sql: update phone set device_version_id = 'polycom${polycom-to-id}' where bean_id = 'polycom';

target.name: update-ac-model
target.sipx-sql: update phone SET model_id='audiocodesMP118_FXS' where model_id = 'audiocodesFxs';

target.name: first-run-task
create-special-users
target.sipx-sql: delete from initialization_task where name = 'first-run'; insert into initialization_task (name) values ('first-run');

target.name: AA-transfer-out
target.sipx-sql: update attendant_menu_item set action = 'transfer_out' where action = 'transfer_to_extension';

target.name: clean-sipx-service-values
target.sipx-sql: delete from setting_value where path='domain/USER_CONFIGURED_DOMAIN_ALIASES'; delete from setting_value where path='domain/SIP_REGISTRAR_DOMAIN_ALIASES';

target.name: backup-ftp-fix-empty-type-2
target.sipx-sql: update backup_plan set backup_type = 'L' where backup_type != 'F';
